description: Third column of Jabotinsky-triangle A038455 related to A006963.
comments: Explicit formula for a(n-3) using partitions of n into 3 parts: cf. Knuth's paper for f(n,3) n >= 3, formula with f(k) := A006963(k+1) = (2*k-1)!/k!, k >= 1.
links: D. E. Knuth, Convolution polynomials, Mathematica J. 2.1 (1992), no. 4, 67-78.
formula: a(n) = sum(binomial(n+2, j)*A006936(j+2)*A039619(n+2-j), j=0..n).E.g.f.: log((1-sqrt(1-4*x))/x/2)^3/6. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, May 02 2003
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
